professional_summary: Over 15 years of document control/management experience. USAF Veteran with expertise in handling highly sensitive government documents and nuclear construction documentation.

key_responsibilities: Develop and maintain department's collaborative workspace and manage SharePoint and Quickbase sites.
Manage electronic filing and submission of QA records into Documentum.
Coordinate department workflow and deadlines to ensure items stay on schedule.
Prepare presentations for Manager or department personnel.
Assist with department reporting and metrics; collect data
Perform data entry and maintain and organize project and engineering information into eRoom database system and IDDEAL Data Management.
Support nuclear outage by maintaining personnel certifications and produce NDT method reports.
Identify and extract reports and perform queries from eRoom database system.
Oversee internal and external document review process.
Maintain proper information configuration management in support of engineering and construction.
Involved in analysis for business decisions.
Supervised projects and controlled documents according to procedures.
